The City

Chania is the capital of Chania region on the island of Crete. The city can be divided into two parts, the old town and the modern city.

What?

Chania is a city on the Island of Crete.

Where?

Crete is a Greek island in the Mediterranein Sea.

How?

You can reach Chania airport from all over Europe.
